title: 'Product is very good.'
body: 'The smell really lasts long. One thing to note here is that it creates dark patches on the shirts underarm part. Otherwise it is very good. It also clears the patchy underarms to even tone.'

title: 'Fragrance lasts for upto about 12 hours. A steal at this price.'
body: It's a steal at this price. Works very well. At least a 12 hour cycle. Could go more. I am not sure about the whitening claims but as far as fighting the sweat smell goes, it's bang on. Also it has a thick consistency which makes the bottles last less longer than, say the nivea roll on, which runs thin. My one bottle lasts 15 days or thereabouts.

body: 'The scent is very mild almost near to nothing. and since it has moisturizer effect as well it has a creamy texture which tends to ruin clothes when wore after applying.  Also does not work as antiperspirant.'

body: It's such a waste product with no fragrance, it's just delivered and after checking it out, I'm thinking of throwing it in dustbin,  Waste of money, the company should do self analysis to avoid such waste product.
